title: Si Jumps a Monster Truck Like a BOSS
description:
Uncle Si insists his costumes are a hit with the ladies, but he only has eyes for ... monster trucks. And boy, does he have a daredevil story to tell. By popular demand, Si regales Phillip, Martin, and John-David with mostly true tales of his time in Vietnam. The boys take a look at some goodies sent in by fans, including an avalanche of black panther sightings. And Si finally weighs in on Bigfoot: Where exactly does he stand on the elusive Sasquatch?
